import React from "react"; import { Button, Modal, Card, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { CardBody, } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import AOS from 'aos'; // import "./profile.css"; class GroupProfile extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ exitModal: false, }; this.fileInputRef = React.createRef(); this.openFileDialog = this.openFileDialog.bind(this); this.onFilesAdded = this.onFilesAdded.bind(this); } toggleModal = state => { this.setState({ [state]: !this.state[state] }); }; openFileDialog() { if (this.props.disabled) return; this.fileInputRef.current.click(); } onFilesAdded(evt) { if (this.props.disabled) return; const files = evt.target.files; if (this.props.onFilesAdded) { const array = this.fileListToArray(files); this.props.onFilesAdded(array); } } componentDidMount() { AOS.refresh(); } componentWillMount() { AOS.init(); } render() { return (
this.toggleModal("exitModal")} >
